headline: Buffett Goofed by Selling Apple Stock Instead of Occidental, but All Isn’t Lost
summary: Berkshire Hathaway CEO Warren Buffett left money on the table by cutting the stake in Apple, but Occidental Petroleum still has a shot at pulling out of the ditch.

headline: If You Like Energy Transfer's 7%-Yielding Dividend, You Should Check Out This 9%-Yielding Peer
summary: Energy Transfer (NYSE: ET) is popular among income-seeking investors.  The master limited partnership (MLP) offers a monster distribution that currently yields 7%.  As good as Energy Transfer's income is these days, fellow MLP Western Midstream Partners (NYSE: WES) offers an even bigger yield at 9%.

headline: Retirement Income With 9% Yield And Growth: Western Midstream
summary: Western Midstream owns and operates 14,373 miles of pipeline, 21 processing and treating facilities. Find out why I think WES stock is a buy.
